domains.description: Covers invoice generation, formatting, tax calculation, discount application and bill presentment. It ensures that rated usage is turned into accurate invoices delivered to customers through multiple channels.

attributes.definition: Generate invoices using rated data and format them according to customer and regulatory requirements, including support for multiple languages and currencies.
Deliver bills through digital or physical channels and provide online bill presentment with real‑time usage and cost information.
Calculate and apply taxes, regulatory fees and surcharges across multiple jurisdictions and currencies.
Schedule and execute bill runs, manage batch and real‑time billing cycles and handle bill run exceptions.

domains.description: Handles payment processing, credit control, dunning and collections, and dispute resolution. It ensures revenue is collected by managing credit limits, processing payments and managing overdue accounts.

attributes.definition: Process payments through various channels, manage accounts receivable, and support multi‑currency settlement.
Manage customer credit limits, spending thresholds and real‑time usage caps; enforce credit policies before rating and billing.
Automate dunning cycles, send reminders to customers with overdue balances and manage the collections process.
Handle billing disputes, process adjustments and refunds, and maintain audit trails for corrections.

domains.description: Supports interconnect and roaming billing, revenue sharing with partners, wholesale/B2B billing and multi‑party settlement. It includes multi‑currency and multi‑taxation features to settle revenues across parties.

attributes.definition: Calculate and settle revenue shares with partners, including B2B2X and wholesale arrangements.
Manage charging and billing for interconnect and roaming services, including rating of inbound and outbound traffic.
Support billing for wholesale services, enterprise customers and complex B2B2X relationships.
Provide flexible settlement across multiple currencies and tax regimes for international and partner billing.

domains.description: Focuses on reconciling rating and billing records, detecting revenue leakage and fraud, performing re‑rating and corrections, and providing analytical reporting to ensure billing integrity.

attributes.definition: Reconcile usage records, rated charges and invoices to identify discrepancies and ensure billing integrity.
Detect and prevent revenue leakage by analyzing discrepancies between network usage and billed revenue.
Monitor usage patterns and transactions to detect fraudulent activities and unauthorized usage.
Provide analytical tools and reporting to monitor revenue performance, usage trends and compliance metrics.
